gui.tooltip.show-workspace-key: Press this key to display the main StardewModSmithy UI.
gui.tooltip.author-name: The default author name to use for packs created via this mod.
gui.tooltip.autosave-frequency: How frequently to automatically save your changes.
gui.tooltip.auto-symlink-reload:
When a new content pack is created, automatically install it.
After the game is relaunched, automatically performs a reload when a content pack is saved.
gui.tooltip.is-loaded: This content pack is loaded, it will be automatically reloaded on save.
gui.tooltip.not-loaded: This content pack is not loaded yet, restart the game to enable automatic reload on save.
gui.paragraph.about.0: StardewModSmithy is a tool for creating your own Content Patcher mods. It happens to be a SMAPI mod itself.
gui.paragraph.about.1: You may use the content packs created by this mod for any purpose so as long as you do not remove the "StardewModSmithyInfo" section in the generated manifest.
gui.paragraph.about.2: This disclaimer only covers the JSON files generated by StardewModSmithy (listed in "StardewModSmithyInfo.Generated". It is not applicable to any other assets packaged in the content pack.
gui.paragraph.about.3: Before you can publish your mod, you must ensure you have proper permission to all other assets you wish to use in your mod, i.e. only use original assets, assets with open permissions, and assets that you have obtained permissions for from the original creator.
